channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Boomer Candy' Funds Are Hot. The Taxes Are Not.
item.description: Investors piling into these fast-growing funds may be surprised by their tax bills

item.title: Dexcom shares plummet almost 40% after company misses on revenue, lowers guidance
item.description: Dexcom issued disappointing results and guidance, which the company attributed in part to a change in its salesforce.

item.title: The Junk in Your Index Fund Is Costing You Big-Time
item.description: Small-cap stocks are on a roll, but the simplest and most popular way to buy them should carry a warning label.

item.title: Strong earnings from industrial AI play Dover prove the stock belongs in our portfolio
item.description: Shares of Dover, which has exposure to artificial intelligence and the biopharma recovery, jumped more than 6% on the report.

item.title: Dow Industrials Rise After Surprisingly Strong GDP Data
item.description: Smaller companies outperform, extending stock-market rotation; Nasdaq and S&P fall.

item.title: Southwest profit falls 46% as airline takes 'urgent' steps to increase revenue
item.description: Southwest is under pressure from an activist investor after it lagged competitors.

item.title: Can Bill Ackman Turn Social-Media Stardom Into a Blockbuster IPO?
item.description: The billionaire investor is aiming to raise billions of dollars for a publicly traded fund next week.

item.title: Honeywell drops on cuts to guidance. Here's why it may provide an opportunity
item.description: The stock's nearly 5% slide Thursday is pushing it closer to a level where we would consider buying more shares.

item.title: Carmakers' Inventory Pain Is Consumers' Gain
item.description: As Ford struggles with the cost of repairs, Chrysler owner Stellantis and Nissan focus on thinning out dealer lots.

item.title: Hasbro beats second-quarter estimates, goes 'all in' on digital gaming segment
item.description: Though Hasbro's revenue declined 18% overall during the quarter, Wizards of the Coast and the digital gaming segment grew 20%.
